name: Metaflow Solutions
overview:
Metaflow provides the industry’s leading mobile content management solution and distribution solutions allowing developers, publishers, content aggregators and sales channels to collectively Discover, Distribute and Deliver content Business Business fast and at low cost.

Metaflow works directly with over 250 of the best return sales channels across the globe and from the world’s biggest publishers to the smallest independent developers of quality content on all major mobile platforms including Java, Android, Symbian, Windows mobile, Windows 7 and Blackberry.

Providing a combined software and managed service solution Metaflow is able to offer Content owners the optimum combination of software licencing and services as well as direct and indirect distribution channels to market including on device portals with billing.

Metaflow connects content owners and licensees to multiple retailers.

offices.address2: Branksome Park House, Bourne Valley Road
